text: Once the new Platform and Remote Execution Container have been installed, you can start the migration process: Reinstall Desktop If you intend to continue using the Legacy Desktop, a fresh installation is required. Refer to Installation and Configuration of Legacy Desktop . Restore Configurations System Import the backup configs from desktop or run following command: $ mzsh mzadmin/<password> systemimport <backup directory>/<filename>.zip Restore migrated parameters, see Restore Parameter. Enable Workflow Groups and Workflows Enable back all the Workflow Groups and Workflows. # Enable all the workflow groups mzsh mzadmin/<password> wfgroupenable * # Enable all the workflows mzsh mzadmin/<password> wfenable <full workflow name> # example, enable all the workflows under a folder # mzsh mzadmin/<password> wfenable ZZ_SVC1234.* Starts Workflows Starts all the Workflow Groups and Workflows again. mzsh mzadmin/<password> wfgroupstart * mzsh mzadmin/<password> wfstart *
title: Post Simplified Upgrade Steps - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
